entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:12 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -39.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 10:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -39.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -43.9°C
Wind: N 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023
